languages.text: {n}С неожиданной для его состояния скоростью Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, срывает с головы черный обруч — и слепо вцепляется в вас. В ваше тело вкатывается волна опаляющей боли, словно кровь в ваших жилах в одно мгновение вскипела.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}С неожиданной для его состояния скоростью Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, срывает с головы черный обруч — и слепо вцепляется в вас. В ваше тело вкатывается волна опаляющей боли, словно кровь в ваших жилах в одно мгновение вскипела.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С неожиданной для его состояния скоростью Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, срывает с головы черный обруч — и слепо вцепляется в вас. В ваше тело вкатывается волна опаляющей боли, словно кровь в ваших жилах в одно мгновение вскипела.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and latches onto you blindly. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and latches onto you blindly. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはその状態の割には驚くべきスピードで頭から黒いサークレットを引き剥がし、やみくもにあなたを捕らえる。まるで血管の血が一瞬にして沸騰したかのように、焼けるような痛みの波があなたの体に押し寄せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはその状態の割には驚くべきスピードで頭から黒いサークレットを引き剥がし、やみくもにあなたを捕らえる。まるで血管の血が一瞬にして沸騰したかのように、焼けるような痛みの波があなたの体に押し寄せる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}尽管海因里希虚弱不堪，但却以惊人的速度扯下了头上的黑色圆环，在目不视物的情况下抓住了你。一阵炽热的疼痛涌进你的身体，你的血液立刻沸腾起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管海因里希虚弱不堪，但却以惊人的速度扯下了头上的黑色圆环，在目不视物的情况下抓住了你。一阵炽热的疼痛涌进你的身体，你的血液立刻沸腾起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con una rapidez sorprendente dado su estado, Heinrix se arranca la diadema negra de la cabeza y se agarra a ti ciegamente. Una oleada de dolor te recorre el cuerpo, como si la sangre de tus venas rompiera a hervir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una rapidez sorprendente dado su estado, Heinrix se arranca la diadema negra de la cabeza y se agarra a ti ciegamente. Una oleada de dolor te recorre el cuerpo, como si la sangre de tus venas rompiera a hervir.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einer angesichts seines Zustandes überraschenden Geschwindigkeit reißt sich Heinrix den schwarzen Reif vom Kopf und starrt dich mit blinden Augen an. Eine Welle bohrender Schmerzen strömt in deinen Körper, als wäre das Blut in deinen Adern augenblicklich zum Sieden gebracht worden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer angesichts seines Zustands überraschenden Geschwindigkeit reißt sich Heinrix den schwarzen Reif vom Kopf und klammert sich blind an dich. Eine Welle gleißender Schmerzen strömt in deinen Körper, als wäre das Blut in deinen Adern augenblicklich zum Sieden gebracht worden.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec une célérité étonnante vu son état, Heinrix arrache le bandeau autour de son crâne et vous empoigne aveuglément. Votre corps est soudain submergé par une vague de souffrance atroce, comme si votre sang s'était brusquement mis à bouillir dans vos veines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une célérité étonnante vu son état, Heinrix arrache le bandeau autour de son crâne et se jette aveuglément sur vous. Votre corps est soudain submergé par une vague de souffrance atroce, comme si votre sang s'était brusquement mis à bouillir dans vos veines.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix; durumu dikkate alındığında beklenmedik bir hızla başındaki kara çemberi söküyor, çıkardığı gibi de seni sıkıca tutuyor. Damarlarındaki tüm kan bir anda kaynamaya başlamışçasına vücudunu keskin bir acı dalgası sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a speed that is surprising given his condition, Heinrix rips the black circlet from his head and blindly seizes you. A wave of searing pain pours into your body, as if the blood in your veins has been instantly brought to a boil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, durumu dikkate alındığında beklenmedik bir hızla başındaki kara çemberi sökerek çıkardığı gibi körü körüne seni sıkıca tutuyor. Damarlarındaki tüm kan bir anda kaynamaya başlamışçasına vücudunu keskin bir acı dalgası sarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
